tool_description: Automatically classifies products into appropriate categories and subcategories based on product attributes and descriptions.

product_title.description: Product name or title for classification

classification_depth.description: Classification level: basic, detailed, or comprehensive

error_messages: Missing product information: Provide both product_title and product_attributes
Invalid classification depth: Use one of [basic, detailed, comprehensive]
Insufficient attributes: Provide at least one product attribute for accurate classification
Classification ambiguous: Product attributes match multiple categories equally
usage: Input product_title and product_attributes array; optionally set classification_depth for varying levels of category granularity.
